thread.title: Matlen Silver Debuts On Inc. 5000 List of Fastest Growing Private Companies in America
thread.title_full: Matlen Silver Debuts On Inc. 5000 List of Fastest Growing Private Companies in America

author: Christina Vinson
title: Matlen Silver Debuts On Inc. 5000 List of Fastest Growing Private Companies in America
text:
Matlen Silver, a national provider of information technology talent, made its debut on the 2015 Inc. 5000 list as one of the Fastest-Growing Private Companies In America. “We are very proud to be recognized on the Inc. 5000 list. Our team’s commitment to providing our clients with exceptional service and world-class IT talent is at the heart of our rapid growth. We will continue to build on this foundation and fully expect to keep the momentum going. “ – Manny Vidal, COO
The list is ranked according to percentage revenue growth over a three-year period. With 107% growth in the past three years, Matlen Silver has seen the most growth in the company’s history. In addition to Inc. 5000, Matlen Silver was listed on Staffing Industry Analysts’ 2014 U.S Fastest Growing Staffing Companies list and awarded the Excellence Award by TechServe Alliance in recognition of the company’s outstanding performance within the industry.
Matlen Silver joins an elite group that, over the years, has included companies such as Chobani, Microsoft, Zappos, Yelp, and Pandora. The 2015 Inc. 5000 unveiled online at Inc.com and with the top 500 companies featured in the September issue of Inc.(available on newsstands August 18 to September 22), is the most competitive crop in the list’s history. Complete results can be found at http://www.inc.com/inc5000 .
About Matlen Silver
Matlen Silver provides and supports technology talent for companies in several industries. An IT industry leader, the company's mission is to enable the success of its clients' technology initiatives by partnering with them and providing them with exceptional consultants sourced by a dedicated account management team. As a result, Matlen Silver's teams work relentlessly to field the highest caliber of IT professionals capable of driving clients' initiatives to success.
For more information about Matlen Silver please contact Christina Vinson, Director of Marketing at (704)496-7065 or cvinson(at)matlensilver(dot)com.
